title: What is the interpretation of a knife in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Reasons for seeing a knife in a dream: A knife is a sharp tool used in the kitchen to cut vegetables or meat and poultry, and seeing a knife in a dream arouses terror in the dreamer, especially when he kills in a dream or stabs someone, as visions of a knife are full of many details, and therefore we will analyze and interpret all your dreams until Find the appropriate explanation for what you saw. The knife in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a knife in a dream is good news in nutrition for the dreamer, as Ibn Sirin confirmed that the knife is evidence of goodness, so seeing a knife is a good vision. An unmarried young man who sees a knife in his dream or holds a knife in his hand , indicates his relationship and marriage in reality. When a man sees that he has bought a knife or sees in his dream that he has a large knife, this indicates that he will be a leader in the future and will occupy a prominent position. When a married man dreams that his wife has a large knife, this means that she will carry Soon the newborn will become a boy. The dagger in the patient’s dream is evidence of the end of his suffering, his recovery, and the coming days in which he will soon feel healthy and well. Seeing cutting food in a dream using a knife is evidence that the dreamer has abandoned something important in his life or has broken off his relationship with someone who brings him food. And food in reality. Ibn Sirin said that the dreamer who sees in a dream that he is killing or stabbing himself with a knife, this is evidence that he was guilty and a sinner and will soon repent to God. The dreamer seeing a person with whom he has a strong relationship, and the dreamer cutting food in the dream in the presence of this person, this is evidence On the interruption that will occur and therefore the relationship between them will end for a long time. When the dreamer sees in a dream that a group of people attacked him and they were holding a knife in their hands, this indicates that the dreamer has many enemies who will soon harm him. If a married man sees himself in a dream swallowing a knife, this is evidence However, he will not spend on his children, rather they will spend on him, and he depends on them for everything related to money. When a man dreams that his hand is cut off, this vision indicates that he will face many challenges in the coming days. When the dreamer sees that he was stabbed with a knife, especially in the abdomen, this is a sign However, his life will be disturbed by the problems in which he will soon throw a big party. The fact that the married woman does not use a knife in his dream, even though he saw it clearly, is evidence that God will give him a righteous son who will honor him and obey him in the near future. The dreamer’s success in freeing the veil of tranquility in the dream Evidence that God will grant him remembrance. If the dreamer sees peace in his dream, and then it disappears in front of him and does not find it in the dream, this is evidence that in the coming period he will complain about the lies of someone close to him, or the fact that he wants to know in reality, but it is mysterious and hidden from his eyes. , This will make him confused and think. What is the meaning of the interpretation of a knife dream for a married woman? When a married woman sees a sharp knife in her dream, this means that evil people are approaching her and seeking to harm her and these people are very close to her. Seeing a married woman whose knife rusts

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing blood in a dream This vision is one of the visions that raises many questions and concerns for many people, because it relates to the real life of a woman only as evidence of her fertility and maturity, and the interpretation of this dream varies according to the social status of the viewer. Whether she is single, divorced, married or pregnant, as well as the man. Seeing blood in a dream Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing menstruation in a married woman's dream sometimes carries positive connotations because it indicates that she will be able to end the problems, pain and oppression within her and start a new life without stress and problems. Menstrual blood in a dream indicates that her body is full of negative energy and that she wants to get rid of it and relax. Seeing menstruation in a dream shows negative feelings that haunt the dreamer and he wants to get rid of them, such as anxiety and panic, and the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream is an indication of some changes in the dreamer's life, whether positive or negative, depending on the situations he finds himself in. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream by Ibn Sirin The interpretation of menstrual blood in a dream is an indication of weak relationships that can lead to deterioration if the dreamer is unable to control the problems that have arisen between him and the person with whom he has a relationship. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing menstrual blood in a dream symbolizes relief from distress and changes the dreamer's situations for the better by starting a life full of different ideas. Seeing menstrual blood in a single woman's dream The interpretation of seeing a lot of menstrual blood in the underwear of unmarried women suggests that she suffers from anxiety due to some things that happen to her and fear of things that occupy her mind and affect the course of her life. ZOE. Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that if an unmarried woman sees menstrual blood in a dream, she must repent for the sins and transgressions she has committed in her life, and if she sees herself purified from menstrual blood in a dream, this is a sign of returning to God and abstaining from suspicions. Imam Al-Sadiq also believes that if an unmarried woman dreams of menstrual blood in a dream, this means that there are obsessions that affect the course of her plans and occupy her with matters that do not exist or have no basis in truth. Menstruation indicates the need to think carefully before making a decision about her future. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation at a different time for a single woman If an unmarried woman dreams of her menstrual cycle at an inappropriate time and loses something, this is evidence that she has found this thing that she lost, and menstruation at a late time shows the girl in the dream that she will do. A lot of money and food for her from where it does not matter. If a girl commits sins or obscenity and dreams of her menstrual cycle at an inappropriate time, this is evidence of the need to stay away from it and stop these actions before they destroy her life. Seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees heavy menstrual blood in her dream, this is evidence that she will be able to

title: Interpretation of a dream about a shark by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a shark: The shark is a predatory fish that eats human flesh and lives in the deep sea. It also has a high attack speed. There is no doubt that seeing it in a dream can cause panic and panic in the dreamer and raise many questions about its meaning and importance. Is it good or bad? Therefore, in this article, we will refer to the most important hundreds of interpretations of seeing a shark in a dream for both men and women, single, married, pregnant and divorced women, and we will learn about the interpretations of major jurists and translators, such as Ibn Sirin speaking about many different cases in which a shark appears in a dream, such as Catching it, killing it, eating it, and so on. Interpretation of a dream about a shark: There is no doubt that seeing a shark in a dream is one of the terrifying visions that can cause fear and panic in the dreamer and raise many questions about its meaning. Therefore, scholars have provided us with many different interpretations of the dream of a shark, the most important of which are: Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a shark in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate the advancement of a person of bad reputation and morals for her. As for Al-Nabulsi, he mentioned that the interpretation of a dream about a predatory shark in a man’s dream is It could be good news for a position of power, influence and prestige, as long as he was not harmed by his attack. Al-Osaimi does not at all discourage seeing a shark in a pregnant woman’s dream, as this may portend difficulty in childbirth and possibly the loss of the fetus. Whoever sees a shark in his dream, this may Indicates a dangerous path. Attacking a shark in a dream, this can indicate physical, emotional, and professional turmoil. Seeing a shark in a dream symbolizes a powerful enemy. Catching a shark in a dream indicates the fulfillment of a desire that was difficult to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a son In his interpretation of the shark dream, Ibn Sirin mentioned several pieces of evidence, such as: Ibn Sirin says that seeing more than one shark in a man’s dream means that he has multiple relationships with women. If the dreamer sees that he is swimming in the sea and a shark approaches him and he feels very afraid, he may lose something. Valuable. As for whoever sees that he is approaching a shark and moving away from it, he will occupy an important position in his work that many compete for. Catching a large shark in a dream is good news, fortunately. Eating a shark in a dream means one’s victory over an enemy. Interpretation of a dream about a fish Shark for a Single Woman When we talk about the interpretation of a single woman seeing a shark in her dream, we may find unwanted indicators, such as: The interpretation of a dream about a shark for a single woman can indicate a mean friend who shows her love, but she is vile and spiteful. If a girl sees in her dream a male shark He approaches her, as he is a disreputable person who wants to associate with her, and she must think carefully before agreeing. As for watching a shark fishing in the dreamer’s dream, it is a good vision that heralds her success and excellence in her studies, or her obtaining a promotion at work and distinguishing herself among her colleagues. Interpretation of a dream about a shark for a woman Married We will discuss the most important interpretations of a dream about a shark for a married woman as follows: A married woman sees in her dream a shark that she wants to catch, and she enters into a heated argument with her husband.

title: Ibn Sirin’s most important interpretations of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman: This vision for a girl has many interpretations and connotations that vary according to the color of the horse and the different psychological and social circumstances in which the girl lives. In this article, we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this dream. Seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman indicates many goals and ambitions that this girl is trying to achieve. If the girl who sees the horse continues to study, her vision of it symbolizes The successes and high grades that she will obtain despite the many obstacles that she faced on her way. But if she sees that the horse is trying to approach her very quickly so that she feels afraid as a result, this is a sign of the presence of a man with wrong feelings who is trying to approach her to harm her. Seeing a horse in a dream is for an unjust woman. Married to Ibn Sirin. If the girl sees that the horse is moving away from her and looking at her with great admiration and admiration, then this symbolizes that she was waiting for a specific thing, but her waiting will not be long, but if the horse cannot move because it is tied, then the dream shows that its owner feels limited as a result of some thoughts that occupy Her mind. In the event that she sees a wild horse that no one can stop in a girl’s dream, this indicates that she does not enjoy those around her and follows her desires that lead to evil. Interpretation of a dream about riding a brown horse for a single woman. Scientists interpret the vision of riding a calm brown horse in an unmarried woman’s dream as A sign of her psychological stability and sense of peace and security, as well as the stability of her family’s financial situation. When the fortuneteller sees that she is riding a brown horse, she will receive a promotion at work and will reach a distinguished professional position due to her efforts and dedication to work. Interpretation of a dream about a raging brown horse for a single woman. Ibn Sirin says: It is It is not good to see an unmarried woman riding on a raging brown horse, as this indicates her disobedience and committing sins, unique in its kind but it shows the whims of the soul and its followers. Dream interpretation of a white horse chasing me for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman with a white horse chasing her in a dream indicates Her close marriage to a man with good morals and religion who has a prominent position in society, and will fill her life with happiness, joy and contentment. The uncle also interprets the dream of chasing a white horse for a girl as a sign of good luck, success, success, and progress, whether it is in her academic or professional life. Colors of horses in a single woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a white horse in an unmarried woman’s dream, which is a horse that combines the two colors Black and white, indicates her fame and high status in the future. It warns her of worries, sorrows, anxiety, illness, and envy. As for seeing a white horse in a dream, it means good luck and hearing good news at all levels of her life. In the case of a single woman who sees a red horse, it is a sign of a new relationship of love, passion, and positive developments on Emotional level, it is said that

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a white cat according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white cat: If you see a white cat one day in your dream, then you should follow us in that article, as the dream of this cat shows many things that are not clear to the person, and sometimes it shows joy, while at other times the meaning of the vision can confirm the lies and deception in which God lives, so There are many interpretations of a dream about a white cat, and we shed light on this in our article. What is the interpretation of a dream about a white cat? A white cat in a dream is one of the meanings in which the opinions of jurists differed. No specific or fixed interpretation has emerged, but some said that it is a symbol of beauty and goodness in life, while other interpreters emphasized that it may warn of manipulation and deception against the sleeper. Sometimes the fortuneteller sees a white cat and from here we show that he is associated with a happy and reassured life with his partner in the event of engagement or engagement. Marriage, but if a person meets a wild white cat who has done any of this, experts predict that he will discover a big secret or fall into an unpleasant matter due to treachery and betrayal, which is unnecessary. It must be from his partner, it could be from one of his relatives. Interpretation Ibn Sirin’s dream of a white cat. The scholar Ibn Sirin is interested in clarifying the meaning of a white cat in a dream and confirms that this is evidence of the existence of a great enemy for the person who sees it, hiding among his acquaintances, which means that he is a serious and excessive friend or relative. Ibn Sirin narrates many difficulties in interpreting a dream about a white cat and warns a person when he sees him. It shows a girl trying to win his heart, but he has bad morals and thus leads to his sadness and multiple games. . They practice it and discover the truth after that. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a white cat for a single woman. A white cat in a dream for an unmarried woman shows the extreme inner and outer beauty of this girl And she exchanges love with people and does not hide bad intentions towards them, in addition to the very attractive appearance that appears in all her circumstances, by following a distinctive white cat in her vision. But if the girl is injured in the dream because of a white cat and it tries to bite her body, it seems that the meaning is that there is A friend intends to betray her or expose herself to a major crisis in life, especially in education, as she cannot move forward at that moment and falls into the problem of deep study. Interpretation of a dream about a white cat for a married woman: A white cat in a dream for a married woman confirms some bad circumstances in her life. If he takes care of her and feeds her inside the house, there will be marital problems arising from someone trying to change her relationship with her husband for the worse, knowing that this person is close to the family and therefore can practice evil. He thinks strongly. However, if the woman finds that there is a white cat attacking one of her children while she is trying to protect her, then she must play this role in the next few days and try to prevent harm to her children, because there are those who are trying to harm one of her children and push her with force and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about a white cat for a pregnant woman: The Cat White in a bitter dream

title: Interpretation of an owl in a dream for a married or unmarried woman

preview.html: An owl in a woman's dream is generally a terrible tyrannical woman. She is also a stubborn, stubborn and very prickly lady who has no security. The owl shows all women unemployment, anxiety and fear. It was also said that he is a traitor and there is no good in him. Whoever sees a woman carrying an owl, he will triumph over her enemy or opponent. And whoever sees that an owl has fallen into her house, then this is a quarrel or a violent quarrel that will take place in that place. Owls generally indicate thieves, and their sound in a dream is separation or disturbance, and it is also an indication of alienation, loneliness, and sometimes immorality. title: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream and its meaning in detail

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a girl in a dream and its meaning in detail. Seeing a girl in a dream has many interpretations. Scientists unanimously agreed that seeing a girl in a dream is a sign of goodness and longevity that prevails in the dreamer. A girl is the source of happiness, beauty, and tenderness.. In this article, we show you in detail the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a young girl in a dream, which indicates a life full of goodness, happiness, and joy. Seeing a girl in a dream is a sign that you are entering a stage New, whether in the field of work or in your emotional life. To see a weak girl in a dream indicates entering a stage of stress. In general, seeing a girl in a dream is a good sign for the dreamer, as it indicates goodness and abundance of food that will dominate the dreamer. And to see an ugly girl in a dream, this promises It is a harbinger of the emergence of problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life and it can be a warning that something unpleasant will happen to the dreamer. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of his daughter. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a girl in a dream as a sign of goodness and abundance of food for the dreamer, especially if she has a good appearance, which indicates A lot of blessed money. In general, seeing a girl in a dream denotes kindness, food, and fertility. And see the beautiful girl in the dream, this dream is good for the dreamer and indicates an upcoming happy event. Seeing a girl in ugly clothes in a dream indicates sadness and troubles nearby. Interpretation of seeing a girl In a pregnant woman’s dream, a pregnant woman who sees a girl in a dream indicates the health of the fetus and its skin. Perhaps God will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a beautiful girl in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of easy pregnancy and the closest natural date for birth. There are those who interpreted seeing a girl in a woman’s dream as It is a sign of an easy and painless birth and that her child is healthy. Interpretation of a dream about a daughter by a married woman. A married woman sees a girl in a dream in a beautiful and elegant way, this dream can be news of an imminent pregnancy. Seeing a girl in a dream for a married woman is good news for her and her family. It can For a girl in a dream, it indicates an abundance of money and promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a single woman’s dream: An unmarried woman who sees a girl in a dream indicates fertility and may be the embodiment of an upcoming marriage. And to see a girl with dirty clothes in a single woman’s dream, this indicates the problems she faces It may indicate her psychological state and that she is entering a stage of despair and depression. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream: Seeing a young girl in a dream is a good sign for the dreamer and can indicate goodness, prosperity and success. If the dreamer is a science student, this indicates that he has reached the highest levels of achievement in science. Seeing a baby girl in a woman’s dream means that she has a stable life full of happiness and love. Seeing a little girl in a dream usually indicates good luck. Therefore, we have presented to you All possible interpretations of seeing a girl in a dream. All of...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an entire village in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing the village in a dream. Villages are small areas where people gather. The city includes several villages. Also, seeing the village in a complete dream is something that some have mentioned, so we have put together for you, dear followers, all the meanings of seeing the village in a complete dream. The dream and also what is the interpretation of seeing an abandoned or unknown village. As we gathered for you, our beloved, what is the interpretation of seeing the village of Sultaniya, married women, pregnant women and men, through the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the village? The interpretation of seeing a village in a dream is complete and entering it indicates To a high position in the centers and that the fortuneteller will obtain a prominent position. Seeing a village in a dream, containing green valleys and beautiful areas, means goodness and long life. Also, dreaming of entering a village with old and demolished houses indicates fears and sorrows. Entering from a city to a village in a dream indicates Until the dreamer will escape from difficult affairs and reach his goals. An epidemic completely entering the village in a dream is one of the unwanted visions and a sign of calamities and disasters. What is the interpretation of seeing a village for an ordinary woman? The interpretation of seeing a village for an old woman is evidence that she will move on to a new life. Full of changes. Seeing a common woman entering an abandoned village in a dream is a complete indication that she will fail in life. Seeing a full, ruined village in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions and indicates the presence of corrupt people in one’s life. Also, seeing an unmarried woman leaving the village in In a dream, Kamel indicates that she will enjoy a new opportunity. What is the interpretation of seeing a village for a married woman? The interpretation of seeing a woman entering a village with beautiful trees or palm trees in a dream indicates great wealth and children. Seeing a village inhabited by jinn in a dream for a married woman is evidence of problems and difficulties that She goes through it in her life. Dreaming about an unknown village full of married women is a sign of hearing good news. What is the interpretation of seeing an estate for a pregnant woman? The interpretation of seeing the entire estate in a dream for a pregnant woman is desirable and evidence of goodness and blessings. Walking in a beautiful village with green trees in a dream indicates Completely to an easy and trouble-free birth. Interpretations of a dream about an abandoned village Entering an abandoned village in a complete dream is an unwanted vision and indicates excessive exhaustion. Seeing a deserted and frightening village in a dream is evidence of sins and transgressions committed by the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing an unknown village? Seeing an unknown village in which there were familiar people in a dream means getting rid of worries and problems. Riding in an unknown village in a complete dream is a sign of a good and long life that the dreamer will have. Seeing unfamiliar people in an unfamiliar village in a complete dream means that you will face psychological problems. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and a team of experts will contact you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting money from the ground in a dream for a woman and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about collecting money from the ground in a dream for a person and for a man The vision of collecting money is considered one of the visions that many people are optimistic about, because money and abundant nutrition mean that there are many things that will change for the better and it means seeing many positive things that have great importance for the visions. Dreaming of collecting money from the ground in a dream for individuals and for men. Interpretation of a dream of collecting money from the ground in a dream for a single woman. When she dreams of collecting money from the ground and collecting paper money, this means that the unmarried girl is going through a financial crisis, distress, anxiety and fear for her future, according to many scholars and in a saying Another for some scholars. That this matter is good for him and he sees an abundance of food, and here we put the interpretation of the dream of collecting money: It indicates a close marriage to a suitable and happy person and her care for him. This vision also indicates the acquisition of a lot of money, real estate, and cars. Losing money for individuals is a sign of failure and wrong choice. This vision indicates Until the romantic relationship will disappear, but it will fail. Interpretation of a dream about collecting coins from the ground for free. When we see a dream about collecting coins, this dream has many different interpretations. It is also necessary to know that the interpretation of the dream differs in many of the details in it, and here we can put the interpretation of the dream about collecting coins: that Dreaming of collecting bills from the land for single people indicates the promotion and great ambitions that the girl seeks in her future. It is also one of the most important interpretations given by scholars for collecting money for an unmarried girl, that this is a sign of marriage, stability in the near future, marriage and childbirth. For an unmarried girl You see that she is taking notes from a land that is not hers, this means that she is facing various challenges and difficulties in her life. Interpretation of a dream about collecting paper money from a land When you see bills on the ground in a dream collecting money, this means many things, one of which is that this person is wasting his money, and if he studies, he will struggle and succeed in his studies, and there are Other evidence of this. We put here: It indicates the marriage of a person if he is single and his circumstances change for the better and he will live a stable and happy life. Also, seeing money diminishing shows the neglect that this person suffers from, through which he may be affected psychologically. Seeing the loss of money is an indication that he has changed many of the decisions he made in the past. See Also: Interpretation of a dream about cooked meat for a married woman, single woman, man and pregnant woman Interpretation of a dream about collecting money from land for married people When a married woman narrates a certain dream in her dream, it means that there are many different interpretations, and this dream means in one way or another that something will happen. For married people: The dream of collecting money from the land indicates that this married woman feels happy, satisfied, and comfortable with the family and enjoys great comfort. Also, saving money for a married woman means that she has a loyal friend who gives her loving advice through which she obtains a bond. And in the vision of collecting money.

title: Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of removing the lower molar

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of extracting the lower molar has many meanings, including the good that heralds good, but it also portends many defects and dangers near the fortuneteller, as extracting a rotten tooth indicates the extraction of pain, but extracting the tooth in the presence of blood or it is extracted with a sharp tool or by a doctor, so There are various other interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about extracting a lower molar. A falling molar in a dream indicates that the viewer will face some difficult situations that will affect the psychological state of the viewer in the coming period. This dream also warns of a major financial loss due to poor wisdom in spending money and a lot of waste. But the one who removes his lower molar with his hand, this means that he will solve all the problems he faces on his own without needing help from anyone and will achieve all his goals and aspirations that he seeks, but the tooth comes out. The special expresses that the dreamer is exposed to a health illness. Interpretation of the dream of removing the lower molar by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the extraction of the lower molar in a dream indicates the loss of a relative or separation from a lover and the dissolution of a relationship with an old friend, but the extraction of a tooth is a matter that is seriously worn out, as indicated by this. . The end of the difficult problems and crises that the dreamer was exposed to in the previous days and the falling of the decayed molar indicates recovery. Interpretation of dreams of removing the lower molar for unmarried women. Removing the lower molar of an unmarried girl is a sign of the girl’s liberation from those painful situations and difficult crises that she went through, but if blood comes out From her molar while it is being removed, this is evidence that she will suffer a little in the next few days due to her disagreements with her fiancé. As for the unmarried woman who sees her, she is pulling her lower molar and she is in good health. This is related to the practical or financial side of the insight, and she may fail in her profession or in the special project she created, and she may lose a lot of money, but the girl who pulls out her lower molar because it is very rotten and painful, this is a sign that she finally gathers her strength and ends her relationship with the person who always It caused her psychological and physical pain, but she did not have the courage to stay away from him and survive this bad relationship. Interpretation of a dream about removing a lower molar for a married woman. Removing a lower molar in a dream for a married woman indicates that she is missing something important and basic in her life, which makes her feel uncomfortable and insecure. Maybe she is not satisfied with her husband or there are many problems and disagreements around her. As for whoever sees her lower molar falling out due to severe decay, this means that she will become pregnant soon and be blessed with good offspring. Which is what I had always hoped for in the past and the removal of the inflamed molar in order for the wife to finally express her freedom from these faltering economic conditions that she and her family have recently suffered from, but a married woman who loses her lower molar may lose a member of her family or break off her relationship with someone close to her and separate from him. For a long time. A period of time. Interpretation of a dream about removing a lower molar for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who...
